description:
Entire Apartment - The place is one studio/single located in the heart of East Village; a neighborhood known for its cafes, restaurants and nightlife. It is close to Astor Place, Ninth Street Espresso, Esperanto, Death + Company, Caracas Arepa Bar and the famous Tompkins Square Park. 

You’ll love my place because of the neighborhood. The place is perfect for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

There are many subways stations within 5 blocks (10mins) away and buses.

Entire studio/single. One queen-size bed, a kitchenette and full-bath bathroom.

Access to entire apartment.

The East Village, NYC’s neighborhood located east of Bowery between Houston and 14th Streets, has become a hot spot for everything from the newest restaurants to old-school record stores. Whether you head there during the day for a picnic at one of the best NYC parks (we recommend Tompkins Square Park), shop its unique vintage clothing stores or choose one of its newly opened bars for a first date, the East Village is easy to get to from just about anywhere in Manhattan and Brooklyn (until the L train shuts down, that is).

East Village is still known for its diverse community, vibrant nightlife and artistic sensibility.

On subway, the nearest stations are Second Avenue (F train), Astor Place (4 6  trains), Eighth Street – New York University (N Q R W trains), and First Avenue (L train). On bus, the nearest buses are M1, M2, M3, M8, M9, M14A, M14D, M15, M15 SBS, M(PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN)..
name: East Village Single-Entire Apt Kitchen & Full-bath
review: We really enjoyed our stay. Great location, great communication and easy check-in and check-out. Overall it is perfect size apartment for a short stay in a vibrant part of Manhattan. Thumbs up :)
